tool_description: An API for forum discussions for a series of popular speed running games.
name: Speedrun
title: Speedrun

api_list.name: Get Individual Information For Each Game
api_list.description: Get specific data about a certain game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://speedrun1.p.rapidapi.com/game/super_mario_brothers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "speedrun1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://speedrun1.p.rapidapi.com/game/{gameid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "speedrun1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Forums
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all forums in the speed runs we cover in this API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://speedrun1.p.rapidapi.com/forum"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "speedrun1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
